channel.title: Diffusion on Keongtae Kim
channel.description: Recent content in Diffusion on Keongtae Kim

item.title: How Online Social Interactions Facilitate the Spatial Diffusion of Crowdfunding
item.description: This study documents the role of online social interactions in the diffusion of crowdfunding which has emerged as a viable alternative source of funding for creative projects and ventures around the world. Using the data on the creation of crowdfunding projects from a leading crowdfunding platform from 2009 to 2013 and Facebook Social Connectedness Index Data, we find that the number of crowdfunding projects initiated in an area is positively associated with the total number of prior crowdfunding projects from areas that are most socially connected online.
